trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around July 31st 1994
divs: Sighting DetailsLights in the sky on a cigar shaped blimp like object.This object was floatinglike a leaf falling dipping up and down with a low hum sound.It paused for amoment and it looked like there were smaller crafts flying around it whichseemed to me to be those black helcoptors that are silent.The object continuedon out of our sight.This took place out in the orange groves so we were able tosee everything very clearly.As we drove down the road a little whole later wesaw the police had blocked off a street and that a power pole had exploded andwas down.The power in that area was out.I also noticed 5 US Marshels drivingaround with thier lights going but no sirens.They were driving around theneighborhoods looking for somthing.Also as i passed through a neighborhood abouta mile from where the power pole had blown i noticed a spectrum of rainbow likelight on the garage to my left.I thought it was strange so i backed up and droveby the house again..There it was again the rainbow like light on the garage ofthe house to my left.I told the people i was with and i backed up yet again andit happened once more.I then looked to my right and saw a large van in thedriveway of the house to my right that said Xray on it.For whatever reason ibelieve i was being exrayed with a spectroscope.Since that day i have beenexperienceing high pitched sounds and frequencies...that was over 10 years ago.
Summary: Cigar shaped object with lights that blew power po
